name: 36 Days of Type || Z // Ziggy Karst (26/36)
description: From Fandom: Ziggy became a student at the Jean Grey's School shortly after Nightcrawler's resurrection. Ziggy's primary mutant ability shows in the form of numerous liquid metallic possibly Techno-Organic in nature, thumb sized little diodes which move, act and react to her mental commands both willfully and subconsciously even when not in her proximity.
